sentences.en: Historian Michael Beschloss debunks a few myths.
sentences.cn: 历史学家迈克尔·贝斯切罗斯揭露了一些神话的真相。

sentences.en: It is this tradition that Lewis sets out to debunk.
sentences.cn: 路易斯要抨击的正是这种传统.

sentences.en: Other accounts of Celtic history debunk these stories as myth.
sentences.cn: 凯尔特语的历史其它帐户揭穿这些故事作为神话.

sentences.en: People who debunk it and say it will never be mainstream, they're just wrong.
sentences.cn: 人们揭穿它,而且说它将会无法是主流, 他们仅仅是错误的.

sentences.en: SCULLY : Am I to understand that you want me to debunk the X - Files project, sir?
sentences.cn: 我可以理解为是你们想要我去揭穿 X 档案项目吗, 长官?

sentences.en: Sequences of maps can also debunk misconceptions.
sentences.cn: 一系列的地图,也有助于厘清民众的错误概念.

sentences.en: So let's debunk some of the most common falsehoods.
sentences.cn: 那么,让我们来揭穿一些最常见的谬误吧.

words.tran_cn: 揭穿；拆穿…的假面具；暴露

trans.tran_cn: 揭穿；拆穿…的假面具；暴露
trans.tran_en: If you debunk a widely held belief, you show that it is false. If you debunk something that is widely admired, you show that it is not as good as people think it is.
